title: Lightning talks
description: As a change of pace, in October we'll be hosting a night of 5-10 minute lightning talks at BaseKit! - Carbon, a simple API extension for DateTime  Gavin Davies, Software Developer at Radify and author of Deal With It: Attitude for Coders - Kahlan, a BDD Framework a la RSpec/JSpec using a Jasmine style notation  Warren Seymour, Software Developer at Radify - PHP static site generation  Kiel Doyle, PHP Developer at ASDAN - Terraform  Andy Gale, Web Consultant at Hello Future - Thumbor  Tom Holder, Technical Director at Simpleweb - Vagrant  Doug Fitzmaurice, Developer at Ents24 - Varnish & ESI  Ade Slade, PHP Developer at BaseKit - Versioning  Dave Liddament, PHP, Java & Python Software Developer - Working with legacy code  Gareth Jones, Software Developer at Brightpearl -- BaseKit have kindly offered to host the evening at their office, and as always there'll be beer and pizza.
